The polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon degradation potential of Gulf of Mexico native coastal microbial communities after the Deepwater Horizon oil spill The Deepwater Horizon ( DWH) blowout resulted in oil transport, including polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons ( PAHs) to the Gulf of Mexico shoreline.
